definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: This sheeting has excellent entrance angularity, which is typical of encapsulated lens glass bead sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 具有更优秀的入射角，这也正是玻璃微珠的优势所在。

sentences.english: It is the great who is assailed by envy.
sentences.chinese: 正是大人物才受到嫉妒的中伤。

sentences.english: It was this journey that changed Jiang Hao’s life radically.
sentences.chinese: 正是这次美国之旅，彻底改变了姜浩的人生。

sentences.english: This, it appears, is the legacy I have received and have now bequeathed to my own child.
sentences.chinese: 而这，正是我已收到并留给自己孩子的遗产。

sentences.english: But that's what Microsoft said about Windows and IE.
sentences.chinese: 但微软也正是这样说视窗和IE的啊。

sentences.english: I’m the one who put the ads there.
sentences.chinese: 我正是那个把广告放在那里的人。

sentences.english: It is in times of adversities that your true character and qualities are shown.
sentences.chinese: 四面楚歌之时，正是你显露不凡气概与特质的机会。

sentences.english: Indeed it was giraffe and deer that have woven the new dreamtime for all to partake in.
sentences.chinese: 的确，正是长颈鹿与鹿为所有物种编织了这一新梦想。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个观点，我们将艺术襄括进了学校课程之中。

sentences.english: It is the representative power of the villagers' representatives that forms the specific basis of the village.
sentences.chinese: 正是村民代表的代表能力构成了特定的村庄基础。

sentences.english: It was because of the train accident that the bus was so crowded.
sentences.chinese: 正是由于火车发惹事故，雄共汽车才会这么多人。

sentences.english: A small illustration of this is the experience of Richard Garriott.
sentences.chinese: 这副小小的插图描绘的正是理查德加雷特的亲身经历。

sentences.english: B----Oh, Come on, high cal is exactly the thing we need here!
sentences.chinese: 哦，开什么玩笑，高卡路里正是我们需要的。

sentences.english: The area that Miaka pointed to was the region where the constellations of Cancer and Gemini shone.
sentences.chinese: 美朱指着的那片天空正是双子星座和巨蟹星座。

sentences.english: So that is my goal, to capture the fantastic details hidden in these natural wonders.
sentences.chinese: 捕捉匿藏在这些自然奇景中的奇异细节正是我的目标。

sentences.english: And this is something the service has been angling for.
sentences.chinese: 这正是这个服务一直谋求的事情。

definition: exactly/just/precisely
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
because/owing to/on account of
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
surname Ye
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
perhaps/maybe
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
no doubt/undoubtedly
to originate from/to come from the fact that/owing to/because of
immediately/at once
as it turns out/by lucky coincidence/(of number, time, size etc) just right
however/yet/but
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
